summary: PB Partners Hub website setup with domain pbpartnershub.in; working through DNS/SSL propagation issues and planning integration of WhatsApp messaging via Interakt/WhatsApp API automation.
architectural_notes: Primary domain to use is pbpartnershub.in (pbpartnershub.com not owned).
DNS target configuration discussed: A record @ -> 3.19.162.21 and CNAME www -> ic0.app; SSL for www may take time after DNS changes.
known_issues: After DNS changes, users may still see old site or SSL/privacy errors due to DNS/SSL propagation and browser/network caching (especially for www subdomain).

existing_features.title: Update the WhatsApp admin dashboard UI to manage approved recipient numbers: show the current approved list, provide an input to approve a new phone number, and allow removing an approved number.

Enforce approved-number checking when sending a WhatsApp message via the Meta API from the dashboard: if the selected recipient is not in the approved list, block the send and show an English error message telling the admin to approve the number first.

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate WhatsApp API (via Interakt) to automate inbound/outbound message handling for the website; approve/configure number 9168761915
Add backend support for an admin-managed list of approved WhatsApp recipient phone numbers, and store the phone number "9168761915" as an approved number.
